fields.name: Client Name
fields.prompt: should be a name of a client, for example Meta Inc.

fields.name: Phone
fields.prompt: should be a phone number in format (###) ###-####, make it random

fields.name: Last Activity Date
fields.prompt: should be a date between 2 years ago and today

fields.name: Renewal Date
fields.prompt: should be a date between today and 2 years from now

fields.name: Joined Date
fields.prompt: should be a date between 5 years ago and today

fields.name: Start Date
fields.prompt: should be a date between 1 year ago and today

fields.name: Created Date
fields.prompt: should be a date between 1 year ago and today

fields.name: Last Updated
fields.prompt: should be a date between 1 year ago and today

fields.name: Created Date
fields.prompt: should be a date between 1 year ago and today

fields.name: Created Date
fields.prompt: should be a date between 1 year ago and today

fields.name: Last Used Date
fields.prompt: should be a date between 6 months ago and today

fields.name: Created Date
fields.prompt: should be a date between 1 year ago and today

fields.name: Log Date
fields.prompt: should be a date between 1 year ago and today

fields.name: Description / Notes
fields.prompt: should be a detailed note about the work performed during this time

fields.name: Timestamp
fields.prompt: should be automatically set to the current date and time when the record is created

fields.name: Date Uploaded
fields.prompt: should be a date between 1 year ago and today

fields.name: File Size
fields.prompt: should be in format like '2.5 MB' or '150 KB'

fields.name: Version Number
fields.prompt: should be in format like 'v1.0' or 'v2.3'

fields.name: Date
fields.prompt: should be a date between 1 year ago and today

fields.name: Status Change
fields.prompt: format should be 'From Status → To Status' (e.g., 'To Do → In Progress')

fields.name: Update Date
fields.prompt: should be a date between 6 months ago and today

fields.name: Tags Added/Removed
fields.prompt: format should describe tag changes (e.g., '+Design, +Review, -Bug')

fields.name: Updated Field
fields.prompt: should be the name of the field that was updated

fields.name: Previous Value
fields.prompt: should be the value before the update

fields.name: New Value
fields.prompt: should be the value after the update

fields.name: Due Date
fields.prompt: should be a date between 6 months ago and today

fields.prompt: should be a date between 1 year ago and today

fields.prompt: should be a date between 5 years ago and today
